tagline.en: A construction node that is dedicated to becoming the first EOS game ecosystem.
tagline.zh: 一个致力成为首个EOS游戏生态下的建设节点。

introduce.en: The core members of the EOSGames team have many years of research and development of graphene technology, independent game development, international community operating experience, etc., distributed throughout the world: China, Singapore, the United States, Europe and so on. Details of the specific core team members can be found on the official website: www.eos.games.
introduce.zh: EOSGames团队核心成员有着多年石墨烯技术研发，独立游戏开发，国际化社区运营经验等，分布于全球各地：中国，新加坡，美国，欧洲等。具体核心团队成员介绍详见官网：www.eos.games
